job_tasks.phrase: As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of a front-end engineer, which is to make the work of other engineers (backend, data scientists) accessible to end-users, fitting the definition of integrating functionality into customer-facing applications.

job_tasks.phrase: The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of new features and functionalities, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the goal of building and integrating generative AI concepts into a usable product, aligning with software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing and refining user interfaces and exploring new methods to deliver value, which are software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to collaborate with different teams (product management, data scientists, back-end engineers) and understand business goals like customer adoption and product market fit, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions working closely with other teams, which is a key aspect of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value.
soft_skills.justification: The act of exploring new techniques implies a willingness to learn and adapt to new methods and technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase suggests a proactive approach to developing new features with a focus on business outcomes (customer adoption, product market fit), indicating innovation and a sense of ownership over the product's success.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end engineering tasks (exposing functionality, building interfaces, ensuring customer adoption) which fall under Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration). While it mentions 'generative AI' as the technology domain, the core responsibilities are about building the user-facing application and integrating these concepts, rather than developing or fine-tuning AI models themselves. There are no explicit tasks related to Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization). Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly defines the role as a front-end engineer and its primary responsibilities. While it mentions 'generative AI', it does not delve into specific AI/ML tasks, making the classification of the role straightforward. The confidence is high, but not perfect (5), as the ad could have provided more detail on the specific front-end technologies or the nature of the 'state-of-the-art concepts' being implemented.
